column2: I think there are very small differences in the many deep dish pizzas in Chicago. However
column3: I would say that Lou's is my favorite (although
column4: due to the proximity to my apartment
column5: it is not my go-to). The ingredients are quality
column7: and the overall experience (besides the long expected wait times) is consistent and good. So if you're in need of a decent deep dish offering
column8: I would definitely recommend giving Lou Malnati's a try.
